---
title: "NRI Shiny Report"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: pdf_document
params:
  county_attributes: NULL
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Hello! Welcome to your personalized report.

```{r nriTable, echo=FALSE}

if (!is.null(params$county_attributes)) {
  knitr::kable(params$county_attributes, col.names = c("Attribute", "Value"))
}
```

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```
